hero.headline: Mapping Precision for Tomorrow
hero.description: Transforming Bangladesh’s terrain with precise, high-quality GIS surveying and consultancy. Trust Geospatial Works.

service-section-overview.serviceSummary: Transform your project with our accurate topography surveys, expertly conducted to ensure precise results.
Transform your project with our comprehensive geotechnical and hydro-geological services.
Tailored bathymetry surveys that provide accurate and detailed underwater data.
Modern surveying techniques using advanced instruments and UAV technology.
Strategic geospatial planning and GIS-based decision support services.
Advanced satellite and remote sensing data analysis for environmental and resource monitoring.

gisSurveyExpertise.headline: Our Skilled GIS Surveyors Deliver Precise Geospatial Solutions
gisSurveyExpertise.supporting copy: Transforming terrains with precise surveys and innovative technologies. Enhancing project outcomes. Let us turn your vision into reality.

image.alt: GIS surveyors conducting field surveys using advanced GNSS and GIS equipment

metrics.title: Years of Excellence
metrics.description: With over 5 years of experience, we have mastered our skills in GIS surveying and consultancy services.

metrics.title: Satisfied Clients, Accurate Surveys
metrics.description: We have successfully served over 1000 clients who have relied on our precise and reliable survey solutions.

metrics.title: Delivering Comprehensive Survey Solutions
metrics.description: Our comprehensive survey solutions have been recognized by leading industry professionals and have garnered numerous commendations.

orthophotoSection.label: Orthophoto
orthophotoSection.heading: Accurate aerial image corrected for true ground position.
orthophotoSection.description: Orthophotos are aerial images corrected to remove distortion caused by terrain relief and camera angle. They offer accurate representations of the Earth's surface, suitable for mapping and analysis.

background image.alt: Survey team conducting bathymetric survey on a river using a boat
Ocean water and rock formations representing hydro-geological analysis
Engineer analyzing land survey drawings during RTK drone mapping

items.title: Transforming Sites with Innovative GIS Solutions

visionStatement.headline: Our Vision
visionStatement.description: Since its establishment,Geospatial Works aim is to be known as a multidisciplinary consulting firm with the ability to complete projects successfully in various fields of consulting services in which we specialize. The central functions are managed through a number of units, including Physical Planning, Human Resource Development, Research & Development, Quality & System Management, GIS in Geospatial & Geotechnical arena, Information Technology (IT), Quantitative and qualitative surveying.

background-image.alt: Geospatial map background representing planning, GIS, and multidisciplinary consulting services
